title: Electrical Technology Viva Questions
text:
Electrical technology is one subject that haunts every chemsem faccha. Its dreaded claws almost never miss a direct one hit K.O on our C.G. Along with its best arsenal, comes the Grand Viva.
This page was created with an intention to do the same. Below are a collection of questions asked during the Grand Viva in Electrical Technology lab. The page is under construction and requires your support to achieve its full caliber.

title: General Questions
text:
These questions are commonly asked in almost every Grand Viva and you are expected to be well aware of them.
# | Question | Relevant Link
1 | [IMPORTANT] Circuit Diagrams of all of the experiments performed | Link to ET tutorials page
2 | You might have guessed that all the graphs and instrument/apparatus characteristics are important. Do be aware of every single significance of the graph (Why certain peaks occur, why the falls occur, Why the slope is negative/positve etc) | Link to ET tutorials page
3 | What does MI and MC stand for in types of Ammeter, Voltmeter etc? Why are the named this way? Explain their differences. | Link to answer
4 | Normal questions on what the general parts of instruments are. This can cover the connection portion, internal working of a Wattmeter. The physical significance of lines that orginate from a DPST switch.
